summary:
-WIP-
New Gear, Spells, NPC (follower potential), Pet (follower potential) , Enhanced Strength Monster/s with more to come

if anyone good with mods would like to help me fix any bugs and convert it to a single file it would be very grateful.
you will also be added to the author team section :)
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][u][b] ...sigh...my ck keeps crashing...not sure what to do? anyone wanna help or try and take over? i can tell you what the aim is to complete.[/b][/u]

This is a working progress and is still in beta
New Gear, Spells, NPC (follower potential), Pet (follower potential) , Enhanced Strength Monster/s with more to come

New Spell/s:
Sacred Thunder 
Sacred Fire
Sacred Blizzard(AOE)
Sacred Trinity
Ruby Lightning(trial test)
Summon/Call Senkokula (requires Conjuration Dual-Casting) works with double summon skill
more new spells

New Gear:
Sacred Mystic Bow 
Sacred Mystic Sword
Sacred Mystic Dagger
[s]Sacred Mystic Axe[/s]

Sacred Psiijic Hood
Sacred Psiijic Robe
Sacred Psiijic Gloves
Sacred Psiijic Boots
Sacred Amulet
Sacred Ring
Sacred Earring 
new gear

Monster/s:
Sacred Dragur Giant (Spawns Many Locations!)
Sacred Bone Welp (Spawns Many Locations, Also attacking Whiterun when you first enter)
Sacred Mammoth (Somewhere in the world - Can't miss him)
New creatures

NPC/Follower(s): (Use Follower mod skill communication among spices)
3 Kajit Followers (Warrior-Dual, Ranger, Mage)
Sacred White Fox(helgan keep)
Senkokula (use summon book)
[/size]Book to summon a warrior added


[i][size=3]*also added in some of my older items:
Ring
Amulet
Glove[/size][/i]
author: self - Bakurai
